bio: Hoddreid, a Nord woman, was a Hunter of Hircine sent by Lord Hircine to kill a werewolf named Sinding. Hoddreid was a wizard, and her corpse is wearing blue mage robes. Hoddreid was recently killed by Sinding within Bloated Man's Grotto. Hoddreid’s corpse can be found inside Bloated Man's Grotto, along with the dead bodies of two of her fellow hunters, named Batum gra-Bar and Ma'tasarr.
name: Hoddreid
